applicant-name.name: NINGDE CONTEMPORARY AMPEREX TECH CO LTD
宁德时代新能源科技股份有限公司

invention-title: Positive electrode current collector, positive electrode sheet, secondary battery, and electric device
正极集流体、正极片、二次电池和用电装置

abstract.p: The invention discloses a positive current collector which comprises a base material and a modified layer arranged on the surface of the base material, the modified layer comprises a matrix layer and a peroxide layer, the peroxide layer is arranged on the surface, away from the base material, of the matrix layer, and the matrix layer comprises at least one of metal or metal alloy. The peroxide in the peroxide layer is formed by elements in metal or metal alloy. The invention also provides a positive plate, a secondary battery and an electric device. The modified layer is arranged on the surface of the positive electrode current collector, the peroxide layer is arranged on the surface of the modified layer, and H atoms in the positive electrode film layer binder and O atoms in the peroxide layer form hydrogen bonds, so that the binding power of the positive electrode current collector and the positive electrode film layer is improved, and the service life of the positive electrode current collector and the positive electrode film layer is prolonged under the condition of ensuring that the positive electrode current collector and the positive electrode film layer are not stripped. The use amount of the binder in the positive electrode film layer is reduced, and the proportion of the positive electrode active material in the positive electrode film layer is improved, so that the energy density of the secondary battery is improved.

本申请公开了一种正极集流体，包括基材以及设置于基材表面的改性层，改性层包括基体层和过氧化物层，过氧化物层设置于基体层远离基材的表面，基体层包括金属或金属合金中的至少一种，过氧化物层中的过氧化物为金属或金属合金中的元素形成的过氧化物。本申请还提供了正极片、二次电池和用电装置。本申请通过在正极集流体表面设置改性层，改性层表面为过氧化物层，正极膜层粘结剂中的H原子与过氧化物层中的O原子形成氢键，提高正极集流体与正极膜层的粘结力，在保证正极集流体和正极膜层之间不脱膜的情况下，减少正极膜层中粘结剂的用量，提高正极膜层中正极活性材料的占比，从而提高二次电池的能量密度。
